ComicInfo.Summary:
Bob Benton’s had an adventurous life, but it isn’t without its tragedies. Now he must face a mistake he made years ago, and it will determine the fate of Black Terror!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Rahzzah | 1 | B | Cover B | Jorge Fornés | 2 | C | Cover C | Ruairi Coleman (a) & Timothy C. Brown (c) | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Jorge Fornés | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Ruairi Coleman | 6 | G/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Rahzzah | 7 | H/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Jorge Fornés | 8 |
